entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:38 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 03:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:24 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
